properties.entry: Update tbl_status SET status_rent = ?, status_reserve = ? WHERE status_rent = ?
SELECT b.subject, s.status_rent, s.date_rent, s.date_return FROM tbl_book b JOIN tbl_status s ON b.ISBN = s.ISBN;
SELECT b.subject, s.status_rent, s.status_reserve, s.date_rent, s.date_return FROM tbl_book b JOIN tbl_status s ON b.ISBN = s.ISBN WHERE subject = ?;
